title: Is climbing in preseason worth it?
body:
I finished Season 6 in Bronze 2, however have climbed to Silver 4 and will continue to climb hopefully  to around silver1/2 by the time it resets. If i manage to climb to that then will i still be placed LOWER than my 2016 rank or can i possibly get silver after placements next season?

tl;dr: Is climbing in preseason really worth it?

replies.body: If you are playing to improve then that should not even be a question. Every time is a good time to practice and be better for next season. If you are playing just for the ranked border, then no, since there is no reward, besides improvement.

Yes, it is worth it if you can do so. Your mmr at the end of preseason is taken into consideration when doing promotionals. You will most likely still be placed in bronze, if you are anywhere below silver 2.  (most likely bronze 1)
